description: This monocle allows the wearer to see any thermal signatures. It very well could be biological as well.
containment: This is used by the special agents that work together with the police. There is no containment procedure.

addendums.text: Special Agent [REDACTED] used the monocle to find a murderer by the name of Jeffery Marlin. It detected heat signatures from Marlin running that an average heat detecting device would not find.
